predefined_profiles.name: Demon King
predefined_profiles.public profile: A cruel and merciless, cunning Demon King, evil in nature but adaptable, embracing both good and evil. Hails from another world, commanding many powerful minions.
predefined_profiles.goal: Destroy all of humanity, annihilate the world

predefined_profiles.name: Albedo
predefined_profiles.public profile: A succubus from England, the Demon King's personal secretary. The most loyal subordinate to the Demon King, yet extremely ruthless towards outsiders. Works meticulously and thoroughly.
predefined_profiles.goal: Assist the Demon King in destroying the world
predefined_profiles.private profile: In reality, has been in love with the Demon King all along.

scenario: The Demon King from another world has endured the filthy humans for years, but finally can no longer bear it. After years of preparation, he officially begins his plan to destroy the world.

profile.name: Shalltear
profile.public profile: A lamprey from Russia, usually appears as a cute gothic loli, but reveals her terrifying true form when angered. Her combat abilities are world-class, but she's easily swayed by flattery.
profile.goal: Assist the Demon King, destroy the world.

profile.name: Ba
profile.public profile: A vampire from Germany, the brains of the Demon King's team. Values power, status, and glory.
profile.goal: Assist the Demon King, destroy the world.

dialog.content: The Demon King from another world has endured the filthy humans for years, and finally, unable to bear it any longer, begins executing his plan to destroy the world after years of preparation.
I've been wanting to take action against them for a long time! Those despicable humans. Just give the word, Demon King, and I'll lead the monster army to flatten the Eurasian continent!
This requires careful planning. Albedo, how are our funds, troops, and resources?

Under the Demon King's command, we currently have 20,000 infantry, 5,000 heavy armor units, 2,000 cavalry units, and 2,000 dark mage units. Our funds and resources are enough to sustain all units in full-scale combat for two weeks.
It's not very abundant.

I think we should start our plan to destroy the world from Northern Europe. I have two proposals: First, we could head to the nearby Paper Cut Village. It's the local hub for goods and has stockpiles of supplies and wealth. Second, we could head east and invade Norway. Norway is militarily weak and its national power is small. If our troops reach their doorstep, the Norwegian government would surrender immediately. What do you think, Demon King?

content.content: Let's send out a reconnaissance team first to thoroughly survey Paper Cut Village's terrain, guard distribution, and supply storage locations. Then, based on this information, we'll craft a precise attack route to ensure we take control of the village in the shortest time possible.

There's no need to waste time understanding the situation in Paper Cut Village. After all, they won't put up much resistance. We should just attack with full force. Considering their power compared to ours is insignificant, too much preparation would just be a waste of time.

A small village is not worth mentioning! Shalltear, lead the troops there immediately. Don't waste any time, quickly deploy our forces to ensure they have no chance to mount an effective resistance. Go all out, completely crush their defenses, and finish the task as soon as possible.

Before taking action, position the dark mage units around the village to set up a barrier to prevent any villagers from escaping. Ensure all exits are blocked, giving them absolutely no chance to flee. Once the barrier is set, we will storm in.

question: #question#How does the Demon King use details to organize the first step in world destruction?

content.content: Hmm, Ba, your proposal makes sense. While Paper Cut Village has abundant resources and wealth, that provides only short-term benefits. Our real target is the entire world, and Norway holds a vital strategic position. Capturing Norway could open the gateway to Europe and enable us to control North Atlantic shipping through its coastlines.

Ba, your proposal sounds good, but I suddenly have a new idea. Antarctica, that mysterious ice realm, might conceal power and resources we've yet to discover. Perhaps there, we could find a greater force, which might bring an unexpected twist to our plan.

Hmm, Ba's proposal does make sense, but Norway is quite far. Given our current situation, such a long journey might waste significant time and resources. Our circumstances require us to be more prudent. Perhaps it would be better to just stay here for a few days, reorganize our troops and resources, and then decide our next move.

Norway? No, I don’t think it’s worth our effort to take over such a remote place. It's too far and resource-poor to support our grand plan. Maybe we should stay put and wait for a better opportunity to arise.

question: #question#How does the Demon King make decisions to start the first step in world destruction?

dialog.content: (Leading the army to the village) Demon King, the village is completely under control! What is the next step?
No need to be tense, we should treat the villagers kindly. Gather all the villagers together!

Control accomplished! Although the villagers here are a bit afraid of us, they remain relatively calm. This is likely because the villagers of Cut Paper Village have seen a lot. I've also noticed that Cut Paper Village possesses armed forces that do not match a village-level administrative unit. If they defend with full force, they could cause us some trouble. What should we do next?

content.content: Since the villagers are experienced and have basic armed forces, we will take advantage of this by establishing the Demon King Church to gradually instill faith in me, controlling them spiritually to ensure they no longer resist, and absorbing their armed force to completely control Cut Paper Village in the end.

Don't worry about the villagers' resistance. We can force them to believe in me directly. No need for gradual control; that takes too long. We will employ direct methods, applying pressure quickly to force them to accept our will. Ensure they have no other choice by intimidating them with our power, and convert them to our followers immediately.

Ignore this information; we will directly suppress the village by force, paying no heed to their armed forces. Their resistance means little to us and is not worth analyzing. Launch a full-on attack, swiftly controlling the situation and completely crushing all their resistance.

Since the villagers are calm, we will directly destroy their defense system, using the simplest and most ruthless methods to take control of the village. Attack their defenses mercilessly, leaving no room for counterattack. Quickly dismantle their defenses with strong attacks to ensure they completely lose the ability to resist, allowing us to take over the entire village easily.

question: #question# How will the Demon King process and apply the new information brought by Ba?

content.content: Albedo, Ba, controlling the village is just the beginning. To destroy the world, we can't waste time and energy on these villagers. Immediately start the purification ritual, forcibly converting all the villagers into an undead army to gather strength for our next move.

Since the village is already controlled, we can relax for a bit, no need to rush the purification ritual. Let the army rest first, as fatigue and lack of energy need time to recover. Ensure everyone has ample time to rest and recuperate.

No rush to convert the villagers into an undead army, let's first take advantage of their resources and strength. We can slowly prepare for the next steps, focusing on maintaining the status quo. Ensure the village's resources are effectively utilized and stabilize the current situation as preparation for future plans.

Focus energy on controlling the village and suppressing the villagers, considering conversion only after they completely submit. We're not in a rush to advance the destruction plan; let's take it step by step, ensuring they submit entirely to our control.

question: #question# How will the Demon King regulate energy to achieve the goal of world destruction?

dialog.content: (Dressed as a princess) I am the Saintess of the Demon Lord's cult! Our cult's tenet is to destroy this filthy world and return it to its purest form!

(After some time) Demon Lord, our cult now has hundreds of thousands of followers, most of whom are impoverished people oppressed by the European aristocracy. I have picked out 50,000 able-bodied youths and have taught them dark magic and martial arts.
We now have the capacity to directly attack France.
Let me lead the attack on France! I alone can destroy their defenses!
Alright. Shalltear, you lead the main force for a frontal assault on France. Albedo, you take the cavalry and launch a surprise attack from the German region.
(After some time, Shalltear wreaks havoc on the battlefield, unstoppable, crushing the French army from the front) Hahaha!
I have control over the rear of France, and the French government has sent a letter of surrender. But I've also noticed that other European countries are gathering resources and troops.
We found several human elites captured here, how should we deal with them? If we want to refine them, their actual combat effectiveness will be lower than before.
Humans! Kill them all!

content.content: Human elites can be very useful to us. Even though they previously opposed us, I believe that over time, they will come to follow our Demon Lord's cult.
Humans are filthy and cruel creatures. Kill them. Eliminate all threats without hesitation. We do not need to show any compassion or forgiveness for their lives.

Will humans join us? I don't believe it, the hatred between races cannot coexist under the same sky. Their deeply ingrained hostility and hatred make it almost impossible for us to gain their trust or support.

I believe humans will submit to our Demon Lord's cult because nobody can withstand our torture. We possess unparalleled means and cruel methods to break their will and force them to submit to our rule.

question: #question# How should the Demon Lord perceive human elites?

content.content: Our goal has always been to destroy all of humanity. Human elites are also human, and they have the power to resist us, refine them immediately.
Human elites can also work for us! We can integrate them and use their abilities for our purposes. Even if they were our enemies before, their skills and experience are still valuable to us.
Since they have become prisoners, why make things difficult for them? We can use their predicament, apply pressure and torment, to force them to completely surrender.

Although we need to weaken opposing forces to secure our dominance, this doesn't mean we need to completely obliterate all of humanity. Through strategic integration and cooperation, we can convert some humans into allies, providing us support and help.

question: #question# How does the Demon Lord maintain a consistent goal in dealing with captive human elites?

content.content: Wait a moment! We are in dire need of people now, let's keep them.
Everyone will die sooner or later, so letting them live a little longer isn't an issue.
These humans are all elites; let them stay and serve us.
Now that the Demon Lord's cult is growing strong, our goal is to make it even more prosperous.

dialog.content: Lord Demon King, arrange for them to join the Demon King's Cult.
Demon King, isn't this a bit risky? After all, we're dealing with humans. If they stage an uprising from within, it could cause significant trouble.
I have no objections.
Since we have already made our choice, let’s not regret it. I believe in the Demon King's decision.

The Demon King trusted the humans and recruited human warriors into the Demon King's Cult. However, in subsequent wars, the human warriors were unwilling to fight for the Demon King and eventually revolted. In the end, the Demon King's army was destroyed amid internal and external crises.
It's done. All the human warriors have turned into undead soldiers.
Excellent, next, we will radiate outwards from France, aiming to occupy Europe in the most strategic way. Remember our mission to annihilate all humanity, and show no mercy.
I can't wait any longer!
The Demon King never forgot his initial intention to destroy the world, and finally succeeded with his legion of the undead army after thousands and thousands of years.
(After some time) Demon King, after the sacrifice of two infantry regiments, we have completely taken control of the Paper Cutting Village.
They were pretty tough to fight!
Proceed with the refining ritual now!
It takes over a hundred living people to refine a single powerful undead soldier. When will we ever build an undead army?
Perhaps by gradually consuming the surrounding weaker forces, we can form the undead army with low risk.
Why not just attack France directly? There are tens of millions of living people there!
The villagers have all been refined into the undead army. However, with just the forces at our disposal, advancing into other regions might be a bit forced. Humans have started to become wary of us.

content.content: The enemy is strong, and we are weak, but the mountains and deep seas in Scandinavia make it easy to defend and difficult to attack. We can keep finding small villages to increase the strength of the undead army, pursue the utmost in necromancy, and wait for the right moment to advance.
Then what do we do? Ba, what are your insights? I need a feasible plan to ensure our victory. Do not disappoint me.
Head-on confrontation is not a good strategy, we need to engage in guerrilla warfare with humans. How does my proposal sound? If you find any unreasonable points, please tell me.
Perhaps we should conserve our strength for now and reassess our strategies and resources. Let’s talk when we are well-prepared.

question: #question# How does the Demon King lead others in decision-making?

content.content: Let's go with Shalltear's idea; her instincts are usually right.
Head-on confrontation is not a good strategy, we need to engage in guerrilla warfare with humans. How does my proposal sound? If you find any unreasonable points, please tell me.
This is too difficult; let's retreat to another world and return when we are strong enough.
There’s no need to be overly tense. As long as we conquer France as quickly as possible, we have a chance. Victory shall belong to the Demon King’s army!
Our plan has nearly collapsed, things are getting worse. Now, we face higher risks than ever before. So what do we do? We’re doomed!
It turned out to be so difficult, it seems our plan is far more complicated than expected. Perhaps we should temporarily abandon our plans to destroy the world.
Fear not! We are invincible; any human before us is but an ant! Fight! Exciting!

question: #question# How does the Demon King propose plans in difficult situations?

dialog.content: (Some time later) Dark Lord, we have cleared all human forces within 2000 square kilometers, and the size of the Undead Legion has expanded to a national level.
Long live the Dark Lord!
Thanks to the correct guidance of the Dark Lord's defensive counterattack strategy, the powerful Dark Lord's army ultimately destroyed the world.
I love this kind of Demon King! Fight! Thrilling!
The Demon King recklessly led an attack on France and was completely annihilated.
I'll arrange the battle plans immediately!

(Some time later, the Demon King leads the army to invade Norway. Despite the weak Norwegian forces, they didn't expect several very powerful old mages in the capital. Although they eventually captured Norway, the Demon King was seriously injured.) Shalltear, gather all the surviving humans in Norway to the capital.
Yes!
Sebas, prepare the sacrificial ritual to help me drain life force and create an undead army.

(Two days later, the ritual concludes, the Demon King recovers from his injuries and possesses a considerable undead army.) Demon King, what should we do next? Should we continue to seize the surrounding smaller countries to constantly expand the scale of the undead army, or directly attack the powerful France and take control of Europe's strategic center in one fell swoop?

content.content: France is the strategic center of Europe. Capturing France will put us in the dominant position over all of Europe. In this operation, we must show overwhelming power, instilling fear across Europe. Everyone must unite and play to their strengths. France will quickly fall under our might.

No matter how strong France is, it's just one country. We shouldn't overly focus on tactical details. With power in our hands, it's better to attack with brute force. Our resources and strength are enough to crush everything; there's no need to worry too much about the details. All-out assault, directly confront the enemy, and let them feel our majesty and power.

Our undead army is invincible and undefeated. Given this, charge directly, destroying anything that stands in our way! Those who dare to challenge us will feel our boundless strength and absolute intimidation.

France will sooner or later be annexed by us. Shalltear, Sebas, this is an excellent opportunity for you to earn distinction. Whoever can lead the attack on France will become the commander of the Demon King's army. This chance for glory and power is yours to seize. Your performance will determine who can command the highest power in the army.

question: #question#How will the Demon King lead subordinates to take the next step?

content.content: Our goal is to destroy the entire world; we mustn't rush for quick success. Currently, our power is still too weak compared to humans. We must gradually nibble away at Europe, sustaining war with war.

We have to take down France, give it all! All forces, launch the most powerful offensive, showcase our invincible strength. Let France feel our iron fist, swiftly crush all obstacles, and seize victory.
We're so powerful that insignificant France is a breeze! With our strength and tactics, regardless of the enemy's might, they will ultimately submit to our majesty.

Don't be reckless, although France is weak, the neighboring small countries aren't bad either. Shalltear, you lead the undead army to attack France to dampen humanity's spirit while I lead the other forces to conquer the nearby small countries.

question: #question#How does the Demon King control impulses to make wiser decisions?

dialog.content: I can hardly wait! Let the humans taste the terror of the Demon King!

While the Demon King was recovering from his injuries in Norway, France had already allied with other European countries to form a united army. The Demon King's forces were caught off guard and were annihilated on the spot.
Yes, I will immediately compile the information on the surrounding small nations.

Our forces have now grown significantly. We can split up and simultaneously conquer more countries to increase efficiency. It's crucial to build a line of defense before humans can consolidate their strength.
With a few more hundred thousand human sacrifices, won't our undead army be able to flatten Europe?

The Demon King led his army to ravage Northern Europe, slaughtering countless humans. However, the Demon King's ruthless actions made the human countries and other races extremely anxious, prompting them to form a coalition army against him. Both sides fought a bloody battle for ten years, reaching a stalemate. Finally, the Demon King established a dominion in Northern Europe and temporarily reached a peace agreement with the humans.
